description: AMAZING ROOFTOP DECK! This bright 3 bed, 3 bath townhome in Burke Mountain offers a rare 600 plus square foot private rooftop retreat complete with a soothing hot tub and open mountain views. It is an inviting space for quiet mornings, outdoor meals, and evening relaxation. Inside you will find 10 foot ceilings, wide plank floors, generous windows, and a well designed kitchen with quartz surfaces, a gas stove, stainless appliances, and a large island. The upper level includes three comfortable bedrooms, a walk in closet, and ensuite in the primary. Year round comfort comes from Heat Pump and forced air heating plus a tankless on demand hot water system. A side by side garage with epoxy flooring and added storage completes this impressive home.
